metadata.title: Thursday, 3rd March, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Labour and Social Security
parts: (a)    whether the rights of employees in private companies without unions are protected and, if so, how; and
(b)    if the employees’ rights are not protected, why.
(a)    who the Board Members of the Bank of Zambia were, as of November, 2015; and
(b)    how many directors and deputy directors, were on contract as of June, 2015.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    when the construction of the Mitete District Council Administration Block will be completed;
(b)    what the name of the contractor for the project is; and
(c)    what the time-frame for completion of the project is.
(a)    how many private universities were registered from January, 2006 to June, 2011, year by year; and
(b)    of the registered universities at (a), how many were operational as of October, 2015.

questions.minister: Minister of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection
parts: (a)    what plans the Government has on land which has remained undeveloped for more than ten years, despite title deeds being issued; and
(b)    what the time-frame for developing land after the issuance of a title deed is.
